title: Pelagia and the Black Monk
description: UK first edition hard cover, with unclipped dust jacket, both in good condition. Light shelf and handling wear. including light creasing and tanning to DJ edges, small ticket residue to rear cover, tanning and foxing to pageblock. Spine is lightly cocked. Boards are in fine condition, pages tightly bound, content unmarked. CN
author: Boris Akunin
